body.name: Corsair iCUE H150i RGB Elite Liquid CPU Cooler (16 Dynamic RGB LEDs, 120mm AF Elite Series FDB Fans, 360mm Radiator, iCUE Software Compatible, LGA 1700, 1200, 115X, 2066, and AM4 Sockets) Black
body.merchantInfo: Sold by Amazon Warehouse and Fulfilled by Amazon.
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 14 hrs 28 mins
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 14 hrs 28 mins
features: Advanced All-in-One CPU Cooling: Offers everything needed to keep your latest Intel or AMD CPU running at peak performance, while curbing the heat of even high-end processors.
Refined Pump Head Design and 16 RGB LEDs: Contemporary pump head design, with 16 individually addressable diffused RGB LEDs, provides a unique look and stunning lighting effects.

Cutting-Edge Cooling Performance: Elevate your CPU performance with liquid cooling driven by three 120mm CORSAIR AF ELITE Series AirGuide fans, delivering powerful PWM-controlled airflow between 450 and 1,850 RPM.

Unite Your Setup: Powerful CORSAIR iCUE software enables you to control and synchronize your cooler’s RGB lighting with all iCUE compatible devices, monitor CPU and coolant temperatures, and adjust fan and pump speeds.
Specialized Cooling Modes for Quiet Operation: Zero RPM fan and Variable Pump Speed specialized cooling modes in iCUE keep noise to a minimum when your system is idle or under light loads.
body.description: The CORSAIR iCUE H150i RGB ELITE Series liquid CPU coolers offer high-performance CPU cooling, integrated RGB lighting, and refined aesthetics, with CORSAIR AF ELITE Series PWM fans that deliver powerful airflow and specialized low-noise cooling modes. With 16 individually addressable RGB LEDs on a modern pump head design, the H150i RGB ELITE Series delivers great cooling with the looks to match. Powerful CORSAIR iCUE software enables you to create vivid lighting effects, monitor CPU and cooling temps, and adjust fan speeds. Zero RPM fan mode and Variable Pump Speed modes precisely regulate noise levels for quiet operation. With a thermally optimized copper cold plate and easy installation on the latest CPU brackets, the H150i RGB ELITE delivers first-class CPU cooling.

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 4.6 4.6 out of 5 stars 354 ratings 4.6 out of 5 stars

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing cooling power for Intel 14900k
reviews.reviewText: The H150i cooler has 3 120MM fans that give it amazing cooling power. I used it in an Antec P20 case and had tons of room. I have it oriented so that the fans blow through the radiator and out of the top of the case. I'm using it with an Intel 14900k and even at 100% cpu usage temps stay around 70-80c using the Extreme setting on the fans and pump. If you leave it on "quiet" they go up to about 86c on a few of the cores. I'm not currently overclocked. The software for this product is called iCue and it allows you to change the LED settings on your system based on color schemes or the temp of the system. It can even control Phillips Hue lights based on the app.The install was super easy. You basically have to just identify which processor type you are using and get the correct standoffs out of the well marked packages. Screw those into the backplate support (which comes with some pre-applied double sided tape to hold it in place to the back of your motherboard. Once the standoffs are in place, the cooler sits down on top of your processor. It includes pre-applied thermal paste. You use 4 included nuts that can be hand tightened down and then snugged into place. The radiator requires that you screw the 3 fans onto it and then secure it into your case. There is a cable (appeared to be USB-c) that plugs into the cooler and it then connects to your 3 fans and to a usb header on the motherboard). There is an additional PWM fan connector that you can plug into your motherboard. The whole system gets power from a sata connector. All of these wires have plenty of length which should allow you to hide them pretty well inside your case (in the P20 they all easily fit on the backside so they don't have to be seen). The top of the cooler has a magnetic piece with the Corsair logo on it that can be rotated depending on your installation orientation.This is a super solid cooler that is really easy to install and keeps your processor really cool. The other really amazing thing is that all of your other computer components should last longer without the hot air from the CPU being blown on them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cool and quiet
reviews.reviewText: Brought my temps down to 30c idle and 60's under high load. Nice and quiet. No instructions in the box but i have installed a ton of liquid cooling through the years so it was easy enough to goto the website to just double check everything in the online documentation. Standard installation though. Oh the lights are cute too

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very easy to install
reviews.reviewText: Works great. Do be careful that your case provides a big enough space. This is the 320mm XL size.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 4, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I get some noice when I push the games but it doesn’t bother me much it does it’s job just wish it was quieter

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works great, super quiet
reviews.reviewText: Installation was a breeze. Cooling a 13700k, it's super quiet while idle. Even under stress testing, fans are barely audible. No pump noises either. RGB control via iCue is pretty easy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Didn't have any issues with the install. Comes with its own thermal paste and the LEDs are addressable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Louder than expected
reviews.reviewText: Performs super well, i would recommend turning the pump to quiet mode in icue because it was annoying. The fans can stay at balance and you have a perfect cooler.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 15, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best cooler I’ve ever owned. Be sure to install It correctly.
reviews.reviewText: The cooling power of this aio is amazing. I launched Immortals: Fenyx Rising and had to snap a picture in Ryzen Master of temps in the 20s. I couldn’t believe it!When you install, be sure to connect it to CPU Fan on the MOBO not PUMP. There are tons of videos on YouTube that will walk you through the install but this is one part a lot of them mess up.The iCUE controls are really nice. One setting I found to be really helpful was setting the middle RGBs to change colors based on the core temp of the cpu. Green for low, yellow for mid and red for high. If you keep your pc on your desk, it makes it really easy to monitor temps in game without an overlay or a second monitor.

reviews.reviewTitle: Llegó un ventilador quebrado (y me lo reemplazaron sin costo)
reviews.reviewText: Uno de los ventiladores llegó quebrado. Tuve que sustituirlo por uno de mi gabinete que no tiene PWM.Fuera de eso, el AIO cooler funciona perfectamente, instalado en el H7 flow en la parte superior. Temperaturas menores a 30 grados celsius en reposo.Actualización: Contacté a Corsair directamente, y fueron amables al enviarme un ventilador de reemplazo! Buena atención a cliente de parte de la empresa.
switched to this from getting max thermals with a nh d15. temps while gaming went from 90-100 to 40-60. noise is very low while playing world of warcraft (retail).

Corsair è un marchio che non ha certo bisogno di presentazioni; negli anni ha saputo crearsi una solida reputazione grazie a ottimi prodotti ed accessori per pc.La fascia di utenti è quella definita Enthusiast, ovvero utenti appassionati di modding perennemente alla ricerca del pc perfetto sia da un punto di vista estetico che delle prestazioni.Io non mi riconosco propriamente in questa categoria di utenti, anche se talvolta amo ammodernare un vecchio mio pc, oppure, come in questo caso, assemblarne completamente uno nuovo. Tra le problematiche più complicate la gestione delle temperature risulta sicuramente al primo posto ed è complicata poiché coinvolge moltissimi componenti ed è soggetta a moltissime variabili, come la gestione dei flussi di aria in entrata e in uscita dal case. Sia la CPU che la scheda grafica sono delle discrete "stufette" e le alte temperature mettono seriamente a rischio la stabilità e la durata stessa del pc.Questo prodotto si prende “cura" della CPU, raffreddandola a liquido e mantenendola in un range accettabile; è una soluzione chiusa, in quanto il liquido tramite due tubi flessibili viene a contatto con la piastra e poi raffreddato dal radiatore con le ventoleUna soluzione completa e razionaleH 150i RGB elite è una soluzione completa che consente il montaggio del radiatore con annesse 3 generose ventole da 120 x 25 mm il tutto fissato a un radiatore da 360 mm; tale radiatore può essere montato sia un orizzontale (la posizione orizzontale ed in alto è quella che personalmente consiglio) che verticale, ovviamente a condizione che le dimensioni delcase lo permettano.Grazie a specifiche staffe di adattamento è possibile installarlo per raffreddare CPU sia Intel che AMD In particolare lo potete utilizzare conIntel 1700, 1200, 1150, 1151,1156, 2011, 2066, 1366 e con CPU AMD del tipo AMG, AM 5, STR 4; unica accortezza è ricordare che le staffe di fissaggio alla cpu vanno fissate nella parte posteriore della scheda madre, per cui prestare attenzione che la parte posteriore sia accessibile nel case, altrimenti optate per il montaggio delle staffe sulla scheda madre PRIMA di fissarla al case; comunque è un' operazione abbastanza semplice; la piastra di dissipazione da montare a contatto con la cpu è di rame e viene fornita con la pasta termoconduttiva già applicata e pronta all’uso; il montaggio completo non porta via più di15/20 minuti. Tralascio qui i dettagli RGB ed i relativi effetti, belli ma dedicati principalmente ai patiti del modding, maentre mi soffermo sulle prestazioni, davvero notevoli;Il mio processore intel i9-13900KF non ha mai superato i 45º e leventole quando sono in funzione risultano estremamente silenziose, niente a che vederecon i miei precedenti PC con quel delizioso effetto "elicottero" che faceva tanto "Apocalypse now”.In definitiva un prodotto davvero valido dedicato a tutti coloro che vogliono godere delle prestazioni dei moderni processori senza dover preoccuparsi del rumore o delle temperature; vi assicuro che non è poco!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the Netherlands on July 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: 3 stars for the fan noise (humming) when gaming, other than that, it's good.
